org.openntf.osgiworlds
Class BaseApplicationConfigurator

java.lang.Object
  org.openntf.osgiworlds.BaseApplicationConfigurator
All Implemented Interfaces:
ApplicationConfiguration
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultDominoApplicationConfig
public abstract class BaseApplicationConfigurator
extends java.lang.Object
implements ApplicationConfiguration

Author:
Paul Withers

Base abstract application configurator. Nothing in this class is Domino-specific.

isDeveloperMode

public boolean isDeveloperMode()
Description copied from interface: ApplicationConfiguration
OsgiWorlds can run in developer mode allowing identity switching to simplify development & testing on a client based setup. Developer mode is controlled by adding osgiworlds.developermode=true to properties

Specified by:
isDeveloperMode in interface ApplicationConfiguration
Returns:
boolean true if OsgiWorlds is running in developer mode.

setDeveloperMode

public void setDeveloperMode(boolean developerMode)
Description copied from interface: ApplicationConfiguration
OsgiWorlds can run in developer mode allowing identity switching to simplify development & testing on a client based setup.

Developer mode is controlled by adding osgiworlds.developermode=true to properties

Specified by:
setDeveloperMode in interface ApplicationConfiguration
Parameters:
developerMode - boolean whether to set the application in developerMode or not

getAppSignerFullName

public java.lang.String getAppSignerFullName()
Description copied from interface: ApplicationConfiguration
Gets the Full name for the user that will be treated as the signer for this application from web.xml. May return null to indicate no signer has been specified. In that case the server/client identity is used.

Specified by:
getAppSignerFullName in interface ApplicationConfiguration
Returns:
String full name for "signer"

setAppSignerFullName

public void setAppSignerFullName(java.lang.String signerFullName)
Description copied from interface: ApplicationConfiguration
Sets the full name for the user that will be treated as the signer for this application

Specified by:
setAppSignerFullName in interface ApplicationConfiguration
Parameters:
signerFullName - String full name for "signer"

getDefaultDevelopmentUserName

public java.lang.String getDefaultDevelopmentUserName()
Description copied from interface: ApplicationConfiguration
In developer mode OsgiWorlds can run as a specific user. This avoids the need for specific authentication. Gets the full name for the user that will be treated as the development user for this application from web.xml.

Specified by:
getDefaultDevelopmentUserName in interface ApplicationConfiguration
Returns:
String the full name for the development user of the application

setDefaultDevelopmentUserName

public void setDefaultDevelopmentUserName(java.lang.String developmentUserName)
Description copied from interface: ApplicationConfiguration
In developer mode OsgiWorlds can run as a specific user. This avoids the need for specific authentication. Sets the full name for the user that will be treated as the development user for this application.

Specified by:
setDefaultDevelopmentUserName in interface ApplicationConfiguration
Parameters:
developmentUserName - String the full name for the development user of the application

Specified by:

context - ServletContext Vaadin servlet context of the application
